Name: onlyoffice-community-server
Overview: Before you start this container you need to create the onlyoffice network.
CAComment: This template is set up to use a custom network. You may have to adjust the network or IP address etc to match your system

rootpasswordformysql(defaultpasswordis'm.Name: Root Password for MySQL ( Default password is 'my-secret-pw' )

mysqlhost-readdescriptionforchanges----&.Name: MySQL Host - Read Description for Changes ---->
mysqlhost-readdescriptionforchanges----&.Description: Container Variable: MYSQL_SERVER_HOST  <----> 'localhost' is used when we do not make use of the mail server docker or we do not want external database at all <----> for external local database use ' onlyoffice-mysql-server ' ( name of the docker that is hosting the mysql database, also without the ' ' ) as long is on the 'onlyoffice' network we created before starting the docker/s or you can use unraid IP you see in the up right corner, but it will be better to just use the name of the docker hosting mysql if your unraid IP is not static. <----> For database hosted on another server use the external IP ( internet IP ).

mailserverapihost-readdescriptionforchan.Name: Mail Server API Host - Read Description for Changes ---->
mailserverapihost-readdescriptionforchan.Description:
Container Variable: MAIL_SERVER_API_HOST 
For external mysql server add the values bellow back to value and default value.
Value: onlyoffice-mail-server
Default Value: onlyoffice-mail-server 
If you installed them on another server add the IP instead.
( For Mail Server Container with External Database )

mailserverapiport(formailservercontainer.Name: Mail Server API Port ( For Mail Server Container with External Database )

mailserverdatabasehost-readdescriptionfo.Name: Mail Server Database Host - Read Description for Changes ---->
mailserverdatabasehost-readdescriptionfo.Description:
Container Variable: MAIL_SERVER_DB_HOST 
For external mysql server add the values bellow back to value and default value.
Value: onlyoffice-mysql-server
Default Value: onlyoffice-mysql-server
If you installed them on another server add the IP instead.
( For Mail Server Container with External Database )

mailserverdatabasename(formailservercont.Name: Mail Server Database Name ( For Mail Server Container with External Database )

mailserverexternalmysqlport(formailserve.Name: Mail Server External MySQL Port ( For Mail Server Container with External Database )

defaultmailserverdatabaseuser(formailser.Name: Default Mail Server Database User ( For Mail Server Container with External Database )

defaultmailserverdatabasepassword(formai.Name: Default Mail Server Database Password ( For Mail Server Container with External Database )

onlyofficedocumentserver-readdescription.Name: Onlyoffice Document Server - Read Description for Changes ---->
onlyofficedocumentserver-readdescription.Description:
Container Variable: DOCUMENT_SERVER_PORT_80_TCP_ADDR 
If you install onlyoffice-document-server container ( and you should, also start onlyoffice-document-server first ) add the values bellow back to value and default value. 
Value: onlyoffice-document-server
Default Value: onlyoffice-document-server

portforxmpp-compatibleinstantmessagingcl.Name: Port for XMPP-compatible instant messaging client (for ONLYOFFICE Talk correct work)
